title: laptop screen cracked by itself
body:
went to bed last night and it was fine, this morning there is a huge crack and it no longer works.  my mom and step dad both claim they didnt do anything to it lol.  they both say it worked when they got up, they brought it to bible study to stream a video off of, and thats when they noticed it was cracked.  

of course they say they stored it properly when driving, and had an eye on it at all times.  seems fishy to me.
